title: Cyclone warning
creator_credit: Brian McDuffie, Peter Johnson and Film Australia
brief_description: A dramatization of the action a community needs to take to prepare for a cyclone in Northern Queensland. Centres on three teenagers, one whose father works on the cyclone warning section of the Bureau of Meteorology. Real life experts in cyclone warnings take part in a critique of the actors’ roles at the end of the film.
